title: Mayura Manjari: 22K Gold Peacock Nakshi Pendant with Coral Drop
materials: Cubic Zirconia (CZ). The gold features a lustrous Hyderabadi Polish for exceptional shine and durability.
features: This exquisite pendant showcases intricate Nakshi work, a hallmark of South Indian temple jewelry. The central design features a majestic peacock (Mayura), meticulously handcrafted with detailed texturing. The open filigree design is adorned with sparkling CZ stones, adding a touch of modern brilliance. A vibrant Coral drop (Pagadam Gundla) adds a traditional touch, symbolizing prosperity and good fortune.
colors: Predominantly yellow gold with the fiery red of the Coral gemstone and the brilliant white of the CZ stones.
occasions: Perfect for traditional occasions like weddings (Vivaha)
and Bharatanatyam performances. Its elegant design also makes it suitable for contemporary parties and celebrations.
description: This 'Mayura Manjari' pendant is a testament to timeless South Indian artistry. The intricate Nakshi work, the vibrant Coral drop, and the shimmering CZ stones create a harmonious blend of tradition and modernity. The high-quality 22K gold and the durable Hyderabadi polish ensure lasting beauty and value. The peacock motif symbolizes beauty, grace, and prosperity, making it a meaningful and cherished heirloom.
